name: EXE v0.6
description:
EXE (Eight by Eight) is a randomly-generated dungeon run where you must collect all of the coins to exit the level. Your high score is determined by the number of enemies you defeat and your overall time.

Controls:

WASD / D-pad = movement

R-shift / X / [square] = attack

Space / A / [x] = jump

Tab / View / [share] = full-screen toggle

Backspace / Menu / [options] = pause/start

Escape = quit
